actions.message:
```
dn!Help                      Lists available commands
dn!Kick [@user] [reason]     Kicks the mentioned user
dn!Ban [@user] [reason]      Bans the mentioned user
dn!Mute [@user]              Mutes the mentioned user
dn!Unmute [@user]            Unmutes the mentioned user
dn!DeleteChannel [#channel]  Deletes the mentioned channel
dn!DeleteRole [#channel]     Deletes the mentioned role
dn!game                      To set bot's game
dn!nogame                    Delete bot's game
```
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
```
Please mention one user in order to kick them!
!Kick [@user] [reason]
```
